title: Motion of VAPB molecules reveals ER-mitochondria contact site subdomains
abstract: Eukaryotic cells rely on rapid molecule exchange at specialized organelle-organelle contact sites. ER-mitochondrial contact sites (ERMCSs) are vital communication hubs. This study uses high-speed molecular tracking integrated with 3D electron microscopy to map diffusion distribution and ultrastructure of ERMCSs, revealing contact site interface structures and diffusion landscapes.
